website_summaries.verdict: A durable double-sided pad that is both waterproof and UV protected.
pros: Double-sided waterproof nylon in choice of blue or orange landing surfaces
30-inch pad folds to 11 inches for storage
Comes with stakes and reflective strips for night flying
cons: Difficult to fold, and the instructions don't help much in this regard

customer_reviews.title: excellent pad for rough terrain
customer_reviews.text: We primarily operate in timber country, taking off and landing in clearings full of wood chips and branches (and logs). The pad provides a perfect solid surface in this environment, as well as a great target. I forgot it once and tried landing on the ground, and on a loading pad I had with me. Both were horrible, I will never forget the pad again. We are glad to have the two colors, there are spots where each are the best choice for visibility.
customer_reviews.author: D the girls in her  room room Sci i we had dinner dinner together with a okie

customer_reviews.title: Protect your Drone.
customer_reviews.text: Great little accessory for a drone. It' appears to be well made, is attractive, and works well for my Mavic pro. The Mavic is very low to the ground and needs some protection from the dirt, rocks and grass. This landing pad fills the needs. It comes with a carry bag and stakes, It cleverly folds up, but could use an instruction sheet. I would highly recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moser

customer_reviews.title: Keeping your drone clean
customer_reviews.text: This landing pad is easy to transport & so useful for the Mavic air because the camera sits so low on the drone the landing legs are so short. It doesn't take very tall grass to get chopped up by the props & wedged up into the camera. The pad also keeps out sand & dirt out of your camera when landing or launching.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot A. Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: Investment Protection
customer_reviews.text: Every quadcopter pilot should own this drone landing pad especially for outdoor. Excellent protection from ground born contamination that could prematurely trash components of our devices. Have more than one device out in a day? I'm buying more. By the way. I did sub plastic stakes for steel in hard SW desert
customer_reviews.author: Traffic Zone n XWalk

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: Did not know what to expect, but this has been a very good purchase. It is compact and fits nicely in a little bag. It is easy to fold. Was concerned when I got it that it would be very hard to figure out how to fold. But one hand at the bottom and one at the top, give it a twist and it folds nice and compact making it easy to fit in it's carrying bag, which can easily fit in a backpack or carrying bag for your drone etc. I have used it on very wet grass and it does shed water pretty well. It is a good size when expanded. All in all very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Nice landing pad
customer_reviews.text: Nice pad, make sure you watch videos on how to fold collapsible reflectors (which this is based on) or you'll bend the inner metal rings for sure. Printing is fine, a few others mentioned printing problems. I might have a dot here or there, but it's not a problem for me. Would have given five stars if they would have included better stakes. They're cheap plastic, I recommend getting a few metal ones instead. I have no idea what the reflective tape is for, those went in the trash. They don't match any of the printing's circles and even if they did they seemed cheap and would likely peel off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Milleker

customer_reviews.title: Well built landing pad
customer_reviews.text: The Kinbon Drone Landing Pad is perfect for the Mavic Mini. The pad is very well built and has a nice weight to it making it a stable landing pad. The outer ring that flips open the pad is a little heavier than what I wanted for backpacking, but it does keep the pad taught and flat when opened. Very easy to fold up and place back into the provided sleeve. Comes with three hold down stakes and reflective stickers for night time landings. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ClimbHigh

customer_reviews.title: Large, easy to see when landing
customer_reviews.text: This landing pad is the largest I've seen for drones. I think its the right size and easy to see from the air. It works well in grass and dirt, and folds easily when packing up. It is double sided so you can change colors depending on your conditions. The spikes it comes with have clamps to hold the pad down as well. I am glad the carry case is durable also. I would recommend this landing pad fro drone owners.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: A must-have if you own a drone!
customer_reviews.text: So a few weeks ago, I needed to do an emergency landing in the sand (I didn't have enough battery to get me back to my take-off point). I got a bunch of sand in the gimble, which was overloading and it's been a nightmare. So I ordered this Landing Pad, and let me tell you... BEST decision ever! It makes it super easy for me to take off or land wherever. It's a great size and easy to land on, and super light-weight and easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: T Briseno

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Being as I just got my first drone, I was totally ignorant of the advantages of having a landing pad. This seems to be just what I needed to provide a clean and well defined landing zone for my Mavic Air. This drone being so small has very limited landing/takeoff clearances and I could see how dirt and debris could damage the drone, camera lens and gimbal. I rely heavily upon the reviews and after all the positive reviews I am glad I purchased this one
customer_reviews.author: LEE COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Decently Easy to fold, although caution it sturdy so it opens strong! It’s not heavy nor very Lightweight. Felt a bit heavier than I had imagine, but the pro it feels very sturdy. So far it feels very sturdy, I’ve placed it on sharp rocks, uneven ground... in the rain, mud... I love that this landing pad separates my drone from the damaging elements. I do wish there was a separate pocket for the steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great Landing Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the first landing pad that I buy and I have to say that I was impressed by the quality of the product. My expectation was less because of the price. Very happy with the product I recommend this product, I'm sure you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: This works great as my drone’s landing pad! It’s compact to carry and easily folds back up into the carrying case, once you get the hang of it; you have to twist it into a figure eight, then it folds right down. It’s well made, and the different colors on each side gives you options depending on your landing site. Now if I could just fly my drone better ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Fatboy02

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.  My only prolem is their video on folding.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the landing pad, however their video on how to refold is a little complicated. My son is a professional photographer and they use light reflectors that have an almost identical construction. He showed me to grab the pad with my hands reversed and twist. The pad almost folds itself when you do it that way.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeP1488

customer_reviews.title: It's a Landing Pad - and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what to say about all the woosies that are almost getting hurt when it comes out of the zip up case, or can't figure how to fold it back up without specific directions. Have you ever folded a bicycle tire, same thing, make a figure eight. It does what it is supposed to do - give you a clear landing location to lock in on.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry & deploy, works great
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, easy to carry and deploy. Sturdy construction with a choice of orange or blues side up when you deploy. I bought it to protect the DJI Spark from wet ground, debris, tall grass, etc. It does the job & looks good in video that you take, too.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W. Tice

customer_reviews.title: Used product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday, opened it up, and saw foot steps and rips all over it. Obviously used product. One star for still being usable.
customer_reviews.author: michael ascencio

customer_reviews.title: This type of pad serves to keep your drone dust free
customer_reviews.text: This item seems to be cheaply made.... almost flimsy. It does work and does keep the dust and loose debris from being stirred up. It’s one of those items you sort of expect it to fail, but so far it’s been okay. Very light, it would be better if it’s had compass N E S W markings to aid in orientation.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: Compact, effective, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great landing pad for my Mavic Air 2. The only thing I would change is either stop including the reflective strips or make them better. The adhesive hardly works and it easy to peel the reflective layer off of the adhesive layer by mistake when removing from the perforated sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LANDING PAD
customer_reviews.text: The landing pad is really compact, easy to open and with a little practice, is easy to fold. It includes 3 holding nails and reflective tape for night flight. Is big enough for any drone or flying model. Great product for a reasonable price. Amazon, like always shipped the product fast. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RM Colon

customer_reviews.title: Good landing pad to avoid tangling propellers in the grass
customer_reviews.text: It's really sturdy which makes it a little challenge to fold, but that's probably good for its durability. Stakes are included to prevent the wind from blowing it away. It's very visible which makes it a good choice rather than using a car mat like I saw being used in a YouTube video. It's two sided - red-orange on one side and blue on the other.
customer_reviews.author: mainebones

customer_reviews.title: Very visible and good quality fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a landing pad for my hobby drones. It really helps with the return to home feature because it is easy for the drone to find and judge the distance from it. It was bigger than I expected and xones with stakes to tie down a bag to store it in and is Orange on one side Blue on the other.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Landing Pad
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a DJI Mavic Mini and needed a spot for taking off and landing in my backyard and this works great, I just lay it on top of the grass so my Drone has a clean flat spot to fly from and land, came with stakes in case I need to make more permanent in the ground
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferris

customer_reviews.title: The right one for FIMI X8 SE.
customer_reviews.text: The Fimi X8 SE 2020 recognizes and lands on the orange side of this pad during precision landing every time. 30 inches is the perfect size. (I have not used blue side). When opened it is very taught. Folds up easy, stores in case.
customer_reviews.author: BLR

customer_reviews.title: A ********* to Fold
customer_reviews.text: I almost sent it back to the maker, but by the time I got it folded, about 45 minutes, I figured that I might as well keep it.
customer_reviews.author: GGG

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made Pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality dye sublimation printed pad. Even the carrying case is well made. Those that have trouble folding it should try the 'twist and tuck' method. Works every time. The red reflective strips are NOT made to stay on the pad when folding it. They are removable and should be used only when the pad is fully extended. Remove them before folding back into the bag. You can store the strips in the case.
customer_reviews.author: R. Loft

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. First time I took my drone out into the wilderness, I didn't even think about needing a good spot to takeoff and land. This works great, super portable and prevents dirt and debris blowing up into the drone. The wind spikes are a great addition as I've had to use them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! It folds down to nothing and is easy to open. It makes it easier to find home when flying at high altitudes and keeps grass and dirt off my Mavic. It could be a little more waterproof but definitely not a dealbreaker by any stretch!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Nice take off / landing pad, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, easy to set up, keeps sand, grass etc from being sucked up by the props and getting into the motors. It is a good size for the average recreational flyer. Folding it up to put in its case is a little tricky but practice makes perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DON B

customer_reviews.title: Love this to protect my drone from takeoffs and landings.
customer_reviews.text: the folding is a little tricky but I have dealt with these many times with photography reflectors. The quality is great love that isnhas to colors. I bought this so my drone can take off in the grass and so dust won't get in my motors when landing and taking off on cement. Glad it came with the spikes to hold it down on those windy days. Prefect for my mavic mini drone but also is big enough for a much larger drone.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Lanham

customer_reviews.title: The best landing pad out there
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of the square landing pads that fold up but it was too bulky and not easy to transport. This landing pad folds up very small and fits nicely into your carry bag. Very well made, not cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: G-Man Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I guess I’m happy I bought this. I usually can find a solid landing zone without the use of one of these. My only complaint is if you do not stake the pad down, the prop wash will blow the pad up and crash your drone.
customer_reviews.author: B. McLauchlin

customer_reviews.title: Folding is the most difficul...but easy to learn.t
customer_reviews.text: This is a good landing pad, well made and accessorized with stakes to hold it down (even though I don't use them as I usually fly off of pavement or concrete). Once you watch a few videos on how to fold it and there are a couple of ways, it becomes easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good value, lightweight weight
customer_reviews.text: Folding is a little tricky until you figure out how to do it. Very lightweight and easy to pack. I like the storage case/vinyl bag and appreciate the the yellow anchor pins. Size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Topspin

customer_reviews.title: Practice folding.  Once you have it, it's easy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use with my new drone. For purpose of clean take off and landing. No worry of small debris in motors if taking off just from land. Good protection. Easy to fold after know how, and compact. Have not used included stakes and stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A Blizman

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for Drone Lovers
customer_reviews.text: The item came intact and new. I used it a few times in different environments and found it delivered. My drones were able to find their Home-Point and landed safely. Did I mention that it helps to keep drones clean from less desirable surfaces? Kudos here.
customer_reviews.author: APT-4

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Prosecutors was bigger than I expected actually. Delivery was on time and lightweight. As I opened it, realized no instructions. Still trying to figure out where the reflective strips go and do I need to remove before folding? Besides that it’s awesome. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: jrey0016

customer_reviews.title: Affordable item to land your drone safe
customer_reviews.text: Launchpad is important to prevent dust makes damages to your drone. This pad is pretty light and packable. Folding it requires some practice (and patience)
customer_reviews.author: Marco Salvadori

customer_reviews.title: Great landing mat, hard to fold.
customer_reviews.text: Landing mat is a good size and feels pretty durable. My only issue is that it is tough to fold. Gotta' put some elbow grease into it, which makes me feel like I'll break it. So far, it's holding up with consistent opening and closing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition for your drone. I wanted something for the drone to take off and land on without stirring up dust but what i didn't expect Was how well you can see it at 700' high . Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: buckwheet

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed at how well this thing is made. The outer ring seems to be made of 1\4" wide spring metal and really holds the pad flat. Easy to fold and very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this landing pad for my drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought a DJI drone last year and wanted this landing pad for my drone after seeing it on a YouTube video. It works great and bright orange is easy to see as your landing
customer_reviews.author: SteveFromBoston

customer_reviews.title: Works well, is a pain to get back in the bag .
customer_reviews.text: Pad works great, and my drone recognizes it. Is a bugger to remember how to fold this thing up to fit it in the bag. Absolutely no instructions telling you how to do so.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE DIEKEMA

customer_reviews.title: Don't stand here!
customer_reviews.text: Use this item at least twice a week. Good safety device for serious drone users. Always make sure nobody is within 3+ meters of platform.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Siekierka

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know if I will ever use the stakes or stickers but this is an excellent pad. The case can even carry your ipad in a pinch. Just be sure you stand away from your friends while unfolding!
customer_reviews.author: Braino!

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I guess that practice will make perfect when it comes to the folding of this landing pad. Very visible and lightweight. Works better on an already solid and level surface like blacktop.
customer_reviews.author: Thunder God

customer_reviews.title: Solid Landing Pad!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. It's a nice twist-and-fold style platform, and my Mavic Air 2 has a nice success rate of returning right back to the helipad during RTH. Great for keeping sand and stuff out of the props, and the two colors are nice. The bag is seeing a little wear and tear, but that's to be expected. The pad is overall very nice! :)
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Clewell

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure I really needed it. now glad I have it.
customer_reviews.text: I've found myself using my drone in odd locations, more often than not without good places to land. This works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Hap Hapablap

customer_reviews.title: Landing performance improver
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times and it does seem to improve landing accuracy. Large enough target for a Mavic Pro 2. Haven’t need the stakes, since the outer ring seems to have sufficient weight. Stakes are good option. The storage bag loop is starting to fray a little. That may become a point of failure or wear.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to drone kit
customer_reviews.text: High quality landing pad. Two sided (different colors). It has stakes to help keep it in the ground on a windy day. Very good size (at least for the drone we gave). I especially like the bag—we use it to keep spare batteries and the drone manual when we go to the park.
customer_reviews.author: molepoblano

customer_reviews.title: The best landing pad
customer_reviews.text: If you every wish to fly following a rain storm, this pad is for you. Great landing pad. You can stake it to the ground to keep it blowing away, and it prevents you from landing in high grass, or wet grass. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Well made landing pad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size Perfect Price and most important no more lawn mowing with the propellers kicking up dust 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: R.C

customer_reviews.title: Very well made landing pad
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product, well made and easy to lay-out and fold back too when done flying...made of quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice and protection
customer_reviews.text: Using the landing pad for take off and landing is a great way to practice and really develop your skills as a drone pilot. Additionally, it helps reduce the amount of dust, dirt, and debris that gets stirred up during these activities, which ultimately helps reduce maintenance due to contaminants.
customer_reviews.author: Dru Ardoin

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: If you fly commercially, this is so important. The landing pad keeps your drone safe from picking up rocks and leafs, and it’s good for flying in a area where there are people and it helps them see that there is a drone near by. Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Great landing pad
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. Made very well . This is a must for keeping your rc item clean and safe landing area. Need to watch YouTube to learn how to fold.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: great for the price, easy to see from the air
customer_reviews.text: well constructed, pops and folds like a summer sun shield for your car..... A couple of practiced youll get it. Very nice quality with pegs.... extremely easy to see from the air.... nice and big
customer_reviews.author: Lisanne

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product so far
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, folds up into a practical size and fits in a container to easily stow. I like it after one use. I'll be back if there's a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Value for $$$ does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Great landing pad, folds easily to fit in it's case and is the perfect size when unfolded for use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product !!
customer_reviews.text: My second from the same company. Works as it should. Easy to deploy and a snap to fold and put back into the case. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gbitt.

customer_reviews.title: Liking it.
customer_reviews.text: Decent price. Quality product. Easily puts away into carrying pouch for transport. Fits in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: GTiPhone

customer_reviews.title: Nice landing pad for drone
customer_reviews.text: Pops open instantly...Takes a minute to figure out how to fold it back up, but once you get it, you will never forget...
customer_reviews.author: Biff Richly

customer_reviews.title: A must for drone operations.
customer_reviews.text: A quality product, works well for use intended. Steep learing curve on folding for storage. Just leave open to cut down on stress.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I. Howery

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: Misleading description. Title says pads plural. Of course it Is only one pad that can be flipped over.
customer_reviews.author: L. T. Southall

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. The rim is extra thick, but still easy to fold and store.
customer_reviews.author: scott breece

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN & DRY TAKEOFF AND LANDING ZONE
customer_reviews.text: This landing pad is so handy to use. It unfolds fast and easy. It protects your drone from wet grass and dirt. My Phantom 4 pro has never missed the pad. It folds up easy and has a nice bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Trails To You

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use landing pad for my drone. It is very durable. Easy to fold. The color is. Ice and bright. Works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t t understand or see the need for the stickers. Good landing pad, otherwise..
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gleason

customer_reviews.title: H
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, I highly recommend this. I have yet to figure out how to get it back into its bag. LOL
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Decent carrying bag. I put the rest of the my stuff in the bag when I'm flying. That and my case = mininal footprint.
customer_reviews.author: GearNinja

customer_reviews.title: works as exspected
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy the folding is different easy when you get used to it bright colors I like will fit any drone well except for the biggest but worth the money will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the world of drones and purchased it on a whim. Little did I know that it is essential when taking off and landing on grass. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great landing pad!
customer_reviews.text: Great landing pad. I could see how some would maybe struggle with folding it up but I just imagined folding a taco in half and that seems to work for me :-)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hames

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling and good size for landing drones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my DJI Mavic Mini. The size is perfect for traveling. Folding can be a little challenging sometimes but light weight is more important for me. Overall, I recommend this product for drone owners.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: More sturdy and durable than expected
customer_reviews.text: More sturdy and durable than expected. I thought it was going to be like a flimsy sun shade but it's not. Its firm but folds the same. Happy with it so far
customer_reviews.author: D. Huang

customer_reviews.title: DJI Mavic Mini Great Landing Pad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent landing pad for my Mavic Mini. Little trouble first folding back up but figured it out in a couple minutes. Excellent product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kielbus

customer_reviews.title: Nice area for drone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Adds a clean take off and landing area for the drone.
customer_reviews.author: bailemi

customer_reviews.title: Reflectors are a waste
customer_reviews.text: The reflectors (imagine puffy stickers) are a waste - they don't stick well and come unglued. I recommend reflective tape if you are using this at night. Looks solid otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Penn Pal

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I use it every time for my drone I have a mavic pro I can take off and land anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Nicole.d

customer_reviews.title: Handy TO&L landing spot including carrying bag.
customer_reviews.text: Landing pad provides - Always a ‘clean’ landing spot. Also, the bag is very handy to store not only the pad but other small items such as my antenna range extender.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a landing pad for my GoPro Karma drone it arrived in good condition and it works well however you will have to YouTube how to fold it back up and put it in the bag. Don't let that scare you it's still a good buy
customer_reviews.author: 100PROOF

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We have three drones and all of them land quite well on these landing pads!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: I love this launch pad. Watched youtube to learn how to fold this launch pad .
customer_reviews.author: ladyblizz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love it keep me at peace when I have a nice spot to land thanks
customer_reviews.author: Robert Betts

customer_reviews.title: Great looks nice
customer_reviews.text: these are great for my mini & micro quads when drew on the grass. Study , fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Sky Solider

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product..definitely needed if you own a drone. Help the drone propellers from getting dirt and other debris flying into when you take off and land..
customer_reviews.author: S. Ha

customer_reviews.title: No instruction manual or phone number for the company.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it is well built. No instruction manual with it. I can't figure out how to fold it back up to put it in the bag. No phone number for the company so I can't contact them. Can't fold it up to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Mavic Air 2
customer_reviews.text: I am using this until I can get some decent landing gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little practice to fold it, but once you get the hang of it no problem
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: No necessarily needed for my drone but it does a great job of protecting the drone during take-off and landing process. Easy to set up and break down and the stakes come in handy on those windy days!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie B Romero

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This claims to be waterproof but after just a few minutes sitting on the snow this was completely wet on the top side of the landing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D'Acquisto

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: I believe the writeup for this product is misleading. It indicates Landing PadS. In truth there is only one pad which is reversible. The pictures show an orange and a blue "pad" but in reality one "side" of this item is orange and the reverse "side" is blue. I was looking forward to 2 landing sites to practice on. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when unfolding
customer_reviews.text: The landing pad is well made and the internal frame is quite springy. When you deploy it make sure you stay clear of your face, I say that for a reason. The landing pad is tight with no flap even in windy conditions. Kinda tricky to refold but once folded is is flat and easy to put back in the included storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Same as higher priced ones
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Too bad we are forced to buy from China.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganUSA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality but hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: I love this landing pad but folding it up after use is a pain in the rear. I would still buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: DarkLord666

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small, easy to fold.
customer_reviews.text: Was tricky learning how to fold it at first, but once you get the hang of it, its easy. Love the small zip close package that it stows away in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drone owners need one
customer_reviews.text: If you own a drone, you need this. It’s great and serves a purpose. And gives the drone a picture to reference when landing. Better than landing on rocks or wet grass
customer_reviews.author: Jbrady

customer_reviews.title: great landing pad
customer_reviews.text: I like it.....does what I needed it for. Good design, very compact when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to fold back up but it is very portable and the stakes work perfect. Water proof
customer_reviews.author: jack johns

customer_reviews.title: Got to have it
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I got four stars on the part where I asked you if it was easy to fold it's a technique pretty easy once you get it but it takes a minute LOL great product though
customer_reviews.author: Welz O.

product_meta.title: KINBON Drone Landing Pads, Waterproof 30'' Universal Landing Pad Fast-fold Double Sided Quadcopter Landing Pads for RC Drones Helicopter DJI Spark Mavic Pro Phantom 2/3/4 Pro Inspire 2/1 3DR Solo
product_meta.description:
Color:Orange & BlueKINBON Universal Drone Landing Pad - A Must Have for Drone Flight Enthusiast
Universal 30'' landing pad is fit for a varity of models, and provide safe landing spot for your drone, and help you to control the drone to land accurately and safely without dirty.
With rich accessories, 1* landing pad + 1*carring bag + 8*Reflective strips + 3*landing nails, provide better flying experience for you.

Features:
✪High quality waterproof nylon material with double sided high-precision printing, and sun protection, not easy to fade. 
✪Universal 30'' landing pad is fit for RC Drones Helicopter, PVB Drones, DJI Mavic Pro Phantom 2/3/4/ Pro, DJI Inspire 2/1, 3DR Solo drone, Gopro Kama, Antel Robotic X-star, Parrot drone, and more.
✪With rich accessories, reflective strips are used for night flying. Nails help to the landing pad work perfectly in windy environments. 
✪Double sided double color with blue and orange, provide more clear landing location for the drone. 
✪Fast-fold and protable rc drone landing pad, easy to carry and store it into the carry bag, and sutiable for many different occasions.

Specification:
♣ Material: Waterproof Nylon Material
♣ Open Size: 30''/75cm, Fold Size: 11''/28cm.
♣ Product Dimensions: 11 X 8 X 2 inch
♣ Package Weight: 12.3 Ounces

Compatible Models: 
✔ DJI Mavic pro 
✔ DJI Phantom 3/2 
✔ DJI Inspire 2/1 
✔ DJI Phantom 4/4 pro 
✔ Parrot drones 
✔ 3DR Solo drone 
✔ UDI drones 
✔ Antel Robotic X-star 
✔ Syma drones 
✔ Hubsan drones
Package Content:
☛ 1 X Landing Pad
☛ 1 X Carring Bag
☛ 3 X ABS Land Nails
☛ 8 X Reflective Straps
☛ 1 X Instruction Manual

Kindly Note: Keep away from your face when fold and unfold landing pad.
feature_bullets: 【Waterproof Premium Material】Made of high quality waterproof Nylon material with lightweight, Open Size: 30''/75cm, Fold Size: 11''/28cm. Double sided high-precision printing, and sun protection, not easy to fade. Very waterproof and durable for use, easy to fold and fast-fold.

【Universal Drone Landing Pad】The 30" universal drone landing pad with double sided, which is perfectly fit for RC Drones Helicopter, PVB Drones, DJI Mavic Pro Phantom 2/3/4/ Pro, DJI Inspire 2/1, 3DR Solo drone, Gopro Kama, Antel Robotic X-star, Parrot drone, and more.

【8 Reflective Straps & 3 Land Nails】 With rich accessories：1* landing pad + 1*carring bag + 8*Reflective strips + 3*landing nails. 8 reflective strips are used for night flying, pasting them to the outer of the printing circle.They will provide clear location for drone in darkness. 3 land nails fixed to the landing pad on the ground firmly, helping the landing pad work perfectly in windy environments.

【Fast-Fold & Portable】Fast-fold and portable landing pad for mavic pro . With elastic material of one side, easy to carry and store it into the bag with zipper. Double sided and double color with blue and orange 2 colors, are applied for different occasions. And also highlight the clear location of the landing place. ( Note: Specific folding ways, please see the last picture. )
【Compatible for wide range of Drones】Suitable for all drone models.NOTE: Please Un-fold in an Open Space and Keep Away From Your Face
